User_Group_Enhancements Toggle should be OFF in DB. SDM Toggle should be ON in DB. Steps to Reproduce: Access User/Supplier Page via Master Data. Export, Download or Upload a Template without User_Group Column. Error generates. Actual result: Error generates. Expected Result: User_Group should be ignored. Thanks, Asma

issues.summary: NG2: CR: Checkboxes are not showing with item on the CR if sourcing and financial approver edit the CR
issues.description: Environment:  Stage Unitid:  78 Employee username:   abdullah.iqbal+emp+78@vroozi.com password:   Welcome@1 Sourcing Approver: Username:   abdullah.iqbal+sourcing1+78@vroozi.com Password:  Welcoem@1 Financial Approver: Username:   abdullah.iqbal+approver1+78@vroozi.com Password:  Welcoem@1 Pre Conditions: Login with employee Enable sourcing Approver toggle Enable financial approval workflow Enable POCR toggles  Steps to Reproduce: Create PR PR gets approved PO is created against the PR Select Sourcing Approver Submit the PR Open the PO Do POCR CR is created and it goes for Sourcing approver first and then Financial approver Login with the Sourcing approver Open the recently created CR Click on Edit button Select item checkboxes are not showing Apply ALL button is showing as inactive  Approve the CR from sourcing approver Login with Financial approver Open the recently created CR Click on Edit button Select item checkboxes are not showing Apply ALL button is showing as inactive  Screenshot Actual Result:  Checkboxes are not showing with item on CR if sourcing and financial approver edit the CR. Expected Results: Checkboxes should be displayed with item on CR if sourcing and financial approver edit the CR

issues.summary: NG2: PR: If Financial approver and Sourcing approver edit and update the items from Apply ALL model then it is showing error in the console.
issues.description: Environment:  Stage Unitid:  78 Employee username:   abdullah.iqbal+emp+78@vroozi.com password:   Welcome@1 Sourcing Approver: Username:   abdullah.iqbal+sourcing1+78@vroozi.com Password:  Welcoem@1 Financial Approver: Username:   abdullah.iqbal+approver1+78@vroozi.com Password:  Welcoem@1 Pre Conditions: Login with employee Enable sourcing Approver toggle Steps to Reproduce: Click on Non-catalog Request under create Select Sourcing Approver Submit the PR Login with the Sourcing approver Open the recently created PR Click on Edit button Select items Click on Apply ALL button Go to Shipping address field Select another address Open the console from inspect element Click on Apply Changes button Error showing in the console Shipping Address is not get updated on the PR items Apply ALL model is not getting closed Note:  If financial approver update the item from Apply ALL then it is also showing error in the console.  For reference:     1000001317  (Open from Sourcing Approver) 1000001207  (Open PR from Financial Apporver) Screenshot Actual Result:  If Financial approver and Sourcing approver edit and update the items from Apply ALL model then it is showing error in the console. Expected Results: If Financial approver and Sourcing approver edit and update the items from Apply ALL model then it should not shows any error in the console and it should update the item and close the Apply ALL model.

issues.summary: Stage - PMAN/SDM - Supplier Export -  User Group values are being fetched in the wrong column in the Exported File.
issues.description: url:   https://stage-go.vroozi.com/#/login username:   asma.latif+SDM_Admin_1@vroozi.com password:  Blueangel1@ username:   notifyvroozi@gmail.com password:  Welcome1@ Preconditions: SDM/PMAN Admin User should have logged into the Application. Steps to Reproduce: Access PMAN/SDM>Master Data>Suppliers Page. Click to Export Suppliers Icon. Export Processes and Icon becomes Green. Click again on the Green Export Suppliers Icon. Export File downloads on the machine. Access and Open it. Please see the User_Groups Column is empty for the SDM Suppliers having one or more associated to them. Search by the User Group Name. Please see the details are available in some other column. For me its BANK_Info_Custom_Fields and BANK_Control_KEY Actual result: User_Groups Column is empty for the SDM Suppliers having one or more associated to them in the Export File. Expected Result: User_Groups correctly contain the values selected for given SDM Suppliers. Screen-shot: Thanks, Asma

issues.summary: Performance Issue: When a Purchase Request (PR) contains 500 line items, there is a noticeable loading delay, specifically when the NG2 implementation is enabled.
issues.description: Pre Condition: NG2 feature toggles should be enabled: Steps to Reproduced: env: Stage Unit id 83. URL:  https://stage-go.vroozi.com/#/login Login:  waheed.nawaz+employee_stage83@vroozi.com Password: Welcome1! Click on the Bulk Upload button and upload the below file. Bulk Upload file having 500 line item.    File Uploaded successfully Open the the PR. Actual Result: Loading a Purchase Request (PR) with 500 line items takes noticeable time, indicating a performance issue. After the load is complete, when the user scrolls through the line items, they display with delays, further impacting the user experience. Expected Result: There should be no delays experienced by the client, as the system is designed to support 500 line items on a Purchase Request seamlessly.

issues.summary: NG2 Upgrade: Catalog PR: When the user updates the header-level shipping address, the system does not update the shipping address on the PR line items.
issues.description: Server:  https://stage-go.vroozi.com/#/login Credentials: Employee:  javaid.sattar+emp1@vroozi.com  / Welcome1@   Pre- Requisite: No default shipping address is assigned against requester user. Create PR from catalog Items.  Steps to Reproduce: Login with above user. open Newly created catalog PR header level and line item level error message is displayed related to missing shipping address. Now select shipping address on PR header. Actual Result: The system only updates the shipping address on the PR header, but the shipping address is not updated for any line items. Expected Result: When the user selects a shipping address at the PR header level, it should automatically reflect on all line items as well.

issues.summary: NG2 Upgrade: Shipping address Field keeps on spinning when the user adds a header-level shipping address to a PR, if no default shipping address is assigned in the user's profile.
issues.description: Server:  https://stage-go.vroozi.com/#/login Credentials: Employee:  javaid.sattar+emp1@vroozi.com  / Welcome1@   Pre- Requisite: No default shipping address is assigned against requester user. No shipping address is provided in BOM file. BOM file is uploaded with more than 25 line items and PR is created in draft. Steps to Reproduce: Login with above user. open Newly created PR header level and line item level error message is displayed related to missing shipping address. Now select shipping address on PR header. Actual Result: Header level Shipping address field keeps on spinning once user adds a header-level shipping address to a PR Expected Result: When the user selects a shipping address at the PR header level, it should automatically reflect on all line items.

issues.description: Server:  Stage Credentials:   ayesha.waseem+10+emp@vroozi.com  / Welcome1@ Sourcing User:   ayesha.waseem+10+sourcing1@vroozi.com  / Welcome1@ Pre-Req:  Sourcing approver Workflow should be on PO output enhancement for supplier should be enable in document settings Steps to Reproduce: Login with the given credentials Open the draft PR Add a line item   Add a supplier which has Output method configure Submit the PR (PR should go to sourcing approver) Login with sourcing approver and access the PR Edit the PR and change the supplier (this supplier should not have any PO out put method assign) Click  Done  button Now click on Submit button Actual: Application will open the Approver comments popup over the the window to provide out put method, hence blocking the user to give output method Expected: Application should show the modal window to provide output method first

issues.summary: NG2 PR document upgrade - warning messages aren't shown on the Line Item modal when users try to update accounting objects with incorrect combinations from apply to all model.
issues.description: Server:  Stage Credentials:   javaid.sattar+emp1@vroozi.com  / Welcome1@ Pre-Req: Steps to Reproduce: Login with the given credentials create PR from bulk upload with valid accounting combinations Company code [RC-2025-2] and accounting combination selected on all  line item  Now select line item and click on apply to all model.  now try to update accounting object from other company code [RC-2025-1] . now click on apply changes button. Actual Result:  No validation information message displayed on PR header when user tries to update invalid accounting objects.  Expected Result:  When user tries to update accounting objects of other company code  then system should display proper validation information message “ The specified change conflicts with one or more of the company info or accounting elements that are already present on this item ”.

issues.summary: PMAN: System throws an error when the tax_value column in the BOM file is left blank or contains a '0' value
issues.description: Issue:  PMAN: System throws an error when the tax_value column in the BOM file is left blank or contains a '0' value Server: URL:  https://stage-go.vroozi.com/#/login Username:  zulkiful.bajwa+StageEmployeeUnitId77@vroozi.com Password: @Welcome1 Pre-Conditions: Log in to PMAN as an Administrator. Prepare a BOM file with data in all required fields, but leave the  tax_value  column blank or provides a '0' value   Steps to Reproduce: Log in to PMAN as an Employee user. Create a Purchase Request using the Bulk Upload feature. Verify the Purchase Request. Actual Result: The system creates the Purchase Request but also generates an error report stating: “Line item (x) Tax Value can only be specified as a positive value.” Expected Result: If the user does not provide any value in the  tax_value  column (and no negative value is specified), the system should not display any error related to the Tax Value.

issues.summary: Stage - SDM - Master Data - Users - User Groups - User Group Name Text containing Apostrophe is throwing error.
issues.description: url:   https://stage-go.vroozi.com/#/login username:   asma.latif+SDM_Admin_1@vroozi.com password:  Blueangel1@ Preconditions: SUPPLIER_DISCOVERY__USER_GROUP_ENHANCEMENTS FT should be enabled for the Company UnitId. PMAN/SDM Admin User should have logged into the Application. Certain User groups should exist in the 'User Groups' Grid. Steps to Reproduce: Access SDM>Master Data>Users Page. Edit Open the User Group. Paste the following text in Description field: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the  industry's  standard dummy text ever since the 1500s when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries but also the leap into electronic typesetting remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum. Save. User Group Saves successfully. Again Edit Open the same User Group. Paste the same text in the Name Field. Save. Error shows and User Group not saved this time. Actual result: Text when contains  Apostrophe  is not being saved and throwing error for the User Group  Name . Expected Result: Error should not show with text saved correctly. Screen-shot: Thanks, Asma

issues.summary: Vroozi API - Move the external configuration to webhook API.
issues.description: This is a technical Debt ticket, we have implemented the external url in purchase API, that will not be able to communicate on the internet on our production servers, since purchase api is deployed on the service nodes. We need to move the code from purchase API to webhook API, so that the purchase API will send request to webhookAPI and webhook API will communicate with the external system to send the request for validation to external system. From QA perspective, we need to test that the external validation is working fine as it is originally implemented and there is no broken functionality. Moreover we can verify from the logs that purchase API is communicating to webhook APi and it is sending the request to external client system.

epic.summary: SDM: NBCU Supplier Discovery Module Enhancement (2024-2025)
epic.description: Objective: Deliver core enhancements to the SDM module by March 2025 (RC-2025-3) to introduce a new construct called "User Groups," enabling enhanced configuration for existing Redbook users and the new general directory users NBCU plans to onboard. This enhancement will also refine control over supplier record visibility for SDM users. Core Enhancement: A new construct that we're calling "User Groups" in SDM.  Each SDM user will be associated with a single user group.  Each SDM supplier record will be associated with 1, or more user groups.  Update User Bulk upload and download. Update Supplier Bulk upload and download. Update SDM supplier search bar on the Home Page based on the user group filters. Update Download based on Location with user group filters. SDM Company Settings and access based on each SDM user group.

issues.summary: SDM: Restrict Special Characters in User Group Names
issues.description: Business Case : As an  Admin , I want the system to prevent special characters (pipe  | , comma  , , and semicolon  ; ) in User Group names to avoid issues during User and Supplier bulk upload processes. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  To ensure the integrity of the User and Supplier bulk upload process, the system should restrict Admins from creating User Group names that include special characters such as pipe ( | ), comma ( , ), and semicolon ( ; ). This restriction will prevent potential parsing errors during bulk upload operations and ensure seamless data handling. Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU). What pages should this change impact?  SDM > Master Data > Users page > User Groups. Which users should be impacted by the change?  Vroozi Admin and SDM Admin. How should this feature work? Restriction on Special Characters : The system should restrict the following special characters from being used in the  User Group Name  field: Pipe ( | ) Comma ( , ) Semicolon ( ; ) Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. issues.summary: SDM: Introduce Feature Toggle to Hide SDM User Group Enhancements
issues.description: Business Case : A feature toggle will be introduced to control the visibility and functionality of the SDM User Group enhancements. This toggle ensures that ongoing development does not disrupt current system behavior until the MVP is fully completed. Acceptance Criteria : Feature Toggle Implementation : Introduce a new feature toggle (e.g.,  SUPPLIER_DISCOVERY__USER_GROUP_ENHANCEMENTS ) to manage the visibility and functionality of the SDM User Group enhancements. The toggle should: Default to  OFF , maintaining current system behavior. Be configurable by system admins to allow testing of enhancements when turned  ON . Preserve Current System Behavior : When the toggle is  OFF : The current system behavior should remain intact. All new SDM User Group enhancement functionality (UI, back-end logic, etc.) should be suppressed. When the toggle is  ON : The new functionality for SDM User Group enhancements should be enabled for internal testing but not visible to end users in production environments. Back-End and Front-End Logic : Ensure that the toggle affects: UI components: Hide or show new elements depending on the toggle state. Data processing: Suppress or enable logic tied to SDM User Group enhancements. Testing Requirements : Validate that the toggle does not impact the current system behavior when OFF. Confirm that toggling ON activates the new enhancements without affecting unrelated system functionality.

issues.summary: SDM: Filter Download by Location functionality based on User Group and Supplier Association.
issues.description: Business Case : As an  SDM user , I want the  Download by Location  dropdown to be filtered based on my User Group and associated suppliers, ensuring I only see and download relevant data. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  Building on the functionality defined in the ticket  - , the  Download by Location  dropdown will now also be filtered based on the logged-in user's assigned User Group and its associated suppliers. When the user selects a location, the system retrieves all suppliers associated with the selected location and the user's User Group. All other existing functionality for downloading supplier data remains unchanged. The added feature ensures the  User Group check  is incorporated into the location filtering logic to refine the supplier data retrieval process. Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU). What pages should this change impact?  SDM > Home Page > Download by Location. Which users should be impacted by the change? Vroozi Admin. SDM Admin. SDM Basic User. SDM Power User. How should this feature work? Filter Locations by User Group : The  Download by Location  dropdown displays only locations: Associated with the User Group assigned to the logged-in user. Linked to suppliers that belong to this User Group. Retrieve Suppliers Based on Location and User Group : When the user selects a location: The system retrieves all suppliers associated with the selected location  and  the user's User Group. If  "All SDM Locations"  is selected: The system retrieves all suppliers associated with the user's User Group, across all locations. Existing Functionality : All existing functionality for downloading supplier data remains the same: Suppliers are retrieved and exported in alphabetical order. Downloaded file contains supplier details. File format (CSV or Excel) remains unchanged. I found this old ticket where Download by Location was originally implemented -    Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. issues.summary: SDM: Filter SDM Locations in Search Dropdown Based on User Group and Supplier Association.
issues.description: Business Case : As an  SDM user , I want the  location dropdowns  in both basic and advanced search to display only SDM locations associated with my User Group and its linked suppliers, ensuring relevant and accurate results. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  The SDM location dropdowns in both the basic and advanced search functionalities will be filtered to show only those locations that belong to the User Group assigned to the logged-in user and are linked to suppliers associated with that User Group. This ensures that users can only search for locations that are relevant to their access permissions. Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU). What pages should this change impact?  SDM > Home Page > Search > Location dropdown. Which users should be impacted by the change? SDM Admin. SDM Basic User. SDM Power User. How should this feature work? Basic Search - Location Dropdown : When the user opens the  SDM Location  dropdown in the basic search bar: The dropdown should display only locations: Associated with the User Group assigned to the user’s profile. Linked to suppliers belonging to the same User Group. The dropdown will still show  ALL  as the default selected option. If Location belongs to no Supplier, then this location will not show up in the dropdown menu (existing functionality) Advanced Search - Location Dropdown : When the user opens the  Search by Location  dropdown in the advanced search section: The dropdown should display only locations: Associated with the User Group assigned to the user’s profile. Linked to suppliers belonging to the same User Group. The dropdown will still show  ALL  as the default selected option. If Location belongs to no Supplier, then this location will not show up in the dropdown menu (existing functionality) Dynamic Filtering : The system should dynamically filter the location dropdown as the User Group and supplier associations change. Updates to supplier records (e.g., new locations added to User Group-linked suppliers) should reflect in the dropdowns immediately or upon the next search. Example Scenario : User's Assigned User Group :  User Group A . Suppliers in the System : Supplier A ( User Group A , Locations: New York, Chicago). Supplier B (User Group B, Locations: Los Angeles, Houston). Supplier C ( User Group A , User Group C, Locations: Boston, Miami). Expected Location Dropdown Results : Basic Search - SDM Location and Advanced Search - Search by Location  dropdown shows: All, New York, Chicago, Boston, Miami. Locations like Los Angeles and Houston (associated with User Group B) do not appear. Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. Questions: Question # AC # Raised By Inquiry Date Assignee Response Date         # Question Recommendation Response Remarks

issues.summary: SDM: Filter SDM Search Results by Assigned User Group
issues.description: Business Case : As an  SDM user , I want the search results in SDM to only display suppliers associated with the User Group assigned to my profile, ensuring I see relevant results. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  The SDM search functionality will be enhanced to filter supplier results based on the User Group assigned to the logged-in user. This ensures that users only see supplier records that they have access to via their assigned User Group. Additionally, the existing  Locations  filter will continue to apply after the User Group check, further refining the search results. This filtering applies to both simple and advanced search functionalities. Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU). What pages should this change impact?  SDM > Home Page > Search. Which users should be impacted by the change? SDM Admin. SDM Power User. SDM Basic User. How should this feature work? Basic Search with "All SDM Locations" Selected : When the user starts typing a supplier's name or other attributes in the search bar: The system filters dropdown (suggestion) results to display only suppliers: Associated with the User Group assigned to the user’s profile. Linked to any SDM location under  All SDM Locations . If no suppliers match, the dropdown (suggestion) shows no results. Upon clicking the  Submit Search  button: The final search results display only suppliers that match the user group and the "All SDM Locations" criteria. If no suppliers match, display the message: "No Current Supplier(s) Found for 'search-text'." Example : User's Assigned User Group :  User Group A Suppliers in the System : Supplier A : Associated with  User Group A ; SDM Locations: New York, Chicago. Supplier B : Associated with User Group B; SDM Locations: Los Angeles, Houston. Supplier C : Associated with  User Group A  and User Group C; SDM Locations: Boston, Miami. The user types  "Supplier"  in the search bar: The dropdown displays: Supplier A Supplier C Suppliers from User Group B (e.g., Supplier B) do not appear, as they are not linked to User Group A. The user clicks the  Submit Search  button: Final search results display: Supplier A Supplier C The system filters out Supplier B, as it does not belong to User Group A. If no suppliers match the search term, the dropdown remains empty, and clicking  Submit Search  displays: "No Current Supplier(s) Found for 'search-text'." Basic Search with Specific SDM Location Selected : When the user selects a specific SDM location from the dropdown: The system filters dropdown (suggestion) results to display only suppliers: Associated with the User Group assigned to the user’s profile. Linked to the selected SDM location. If no suppliers match, the dropdown (suggestion) shows no results. Upon clicking the  Submit Search  button: The final search results display only suppliers that match the user group and the selected location. If no suppliers match, display the message: "No Current Supplier(s) Found for 'search-text'." Example : User's Assigned User Group :  User Group A Suppliers in the System : Supplier A : Associated with  User Group A ; SDM Locations: New York, Chicago. Supplier B : Associated with User Group B; SDM Locations: Los Angeles, Houston. Supplier C : Associated with  User Group A  and User Group C; SDM Locations: Boston, Miami. The user selects  New York  from the location dropdown and types  "Supplier"  in the search bar: The dropdown displays: Supplier A (linked to User Group A and New York). Supplier C does not appear, as it is not linked to New York. The user clicks the  Submit Search  button: Final search results display: Supplier A Supplier C and Supplier B are excluded as they are not associated with New York. If no suppliers match the selected location and search term, clicking  Submit Search  displays: "No Current Supplier(s) Found for 'search-text'." Advanced Search Functionality : In the Advanced Search section, the user can input additional filters such as supplier name, location, category, etc. The final search results returned should still be limited to: Suppliers associated with the user's User Group. If no suppliers match all criteria: Display the same message: "No Current Supplier(s) Found for 'search-text'." UI and Search Experience : The dropdown search results should dynamically update based on the User Group and Location filters as the user types. Advanced Search should display results that honor all selected filters while adhering to the User Group restriction. Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. Questions: Question # AC # Raised By Inquiry Date Assignee Response Date Vroozi Admin should see everything un-restricted because he would not have any user groups assigned. Need to update the description so that testing can be done for this scenario. If we do not assign a User group to a Vroozi Admin, will it break the system today? Based on that answer we need to decide this field should be available for this user and also mandatory or not.      12/31/2024      1/2/2025 Need to check how SOLR data-fix would be required for old suppliers that would require data-script to add a User Group. We cannot do a data-fix. Bulk upload or manual update required on the supplier side for User Groups in order for the results to show up in SOLR.   12/31/2024   1/2/2025 Should we filter the list of available Locations based on the user’s group definitions? Currently, the user only sees Locations associated with at least one Supplier they can search for, so it would be ideal to retain the existing functionality. Yes, we should filter the locations based on the user group that the user is associated to and which suppliers are linked to this location. No reason why other locations for suppliers that belong to a different user group shows up in the dropdown.   12/31/2024 1/2/2025 Do we need to filter the Categories, Attributes, Custom Fields based on the User Groups as well in the Advanced Search section?  Can you please check in with   on this in the office so that we can get some clarity on how this is implemented on the BE and accordingly decide how to tackle Advanced search. I’ll create a new ticket based on that discussion. (Answer = NO)   1/2/2025   1/2/2025 # Question Recommendation Response Remarks      Datafix should be part of this ticket as well for SOLR.

issues.summary: PMAN | SDM: Incorporate User Groups Field in Supplier Bulk Upload and Download Templates
issues.description: Business Case : As an  Admin , I want to manage the  User Groups  field in  Supplier  Bulk Upload and Download templates to link User Group(s) with Supplier records efficiently. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  The  User Groups  field will be integrated into the Supplier Bulk Upload and Download templates for both PMAN and SDM. This field allows Admins to assign one or more active and non-deleted User Group(s) to supplier records. For SDM suppliers, the  User Group  field will be mandatory, ensuring proper linkage and access control. The system will validate the field during uploads and populate it during downloads. Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU). What pages should this change impact? PMAN > Master Data > Users > Supplier Bulk Upload, Download, & Template. SDM > Master Data > Users > Supplier Bulk Upload, Download, & Template. Which users should be impacted by the change? Vroozi Admin. SDM Admin. How should this feature work? Header in Templates : The column header for the User Group field in both PMAN and SDM templates should be named  User_Groups  (case-sensitive). Multi-Select Functionality : The  User_Groups  column should allow multiple User Group names for a supplier record. User Group names must be active and non-deleted. Behavior for SDM Suppliers : If the supplier record is an SDM supplier, the  User_Groups  field is mandatory. Admins must provide at least one valid User Group name in the  User_Groups  column. If the field is empty or contains invalid User Group names, the system should: Throw an error during the upload process. Include a detailed error message in the error report (Use existing error message format). Behavior for Non-SDM Suppliers : If the supplier record is not an SDM supplier, the  User_Groups  field is optional. Leaving the field blank or including User Group names will not result in errors. User Group data will not be saved for Non-SDM suppliers. Bulk Download : When Admins download the supplier bulk file: The  User_Groups  field should display all User Group names linked to each supplier record, separated by a delimiter (e.g., a comma). If no User Groups are linked to a supplier, the field should remain blank. Validation Rules : The system must validate the  User_Groups  field during the bulk upload process to ensure: All User Groups exist in the system. All User Groups are active and non-deleted. The field is populated for SDM suppliers when required. Consistency Between Templates : Ensure both PMAN and SDM templates include the  User_Groups  field with identical functionality and validation rules. Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. Questions: Question # AC # Raised By Inquiry Date Assignee Response Date What happens when a User Group name has “comma” in it and there are multiple User Groups associated with the supplier? Need to confirm with BE if these 3 symbols are used in Bulk upload | ; , so that we can restrict them in the User group name itself. Based on   ‘s feedback I’ll create a new ticket to restrict these symbols in the Group name field.   12/31/2024      1/2/2025 # Question Recommendation Response Remarks

issues.summary: PMAN | SDM: Incorporate User Group Field in User Bulk Upload and Download Templates
issues.description: Business Case : As an  Admin , I want to manage the  User Group  field in  User Bulk Upload  and  Download  templates to efficiently link a User Group with User records based on their roles. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  The  User Group  field will be integrated into the User Bulk Upload and Download templates for both PMAN and SDM. The field will follow specific validation rules and behavior depending on the user’s roles and the side (PMAN or SDM) from which the bulk upload is performed. The field will allow Admins to assign a single active and non-deleted User Group to a user when the user has an SDM role. The system will validate and process this field during uploads and populate it during downloads. Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU). What pages should this change impact?   PMAN > Master Data > Users > User Bulk Upload, Download, & Template. SDM > Master Data > Users > User Bulk Upload, Download, & Template. Which users should be impacted by the change? Header in Templates : The column header for the User Group field in both PMAN and SDM templates should be named  User_Group  (case-sensitive). Single User Group : The  User_Group  column will allow only one User Group name per user record. The value must be the name of an active, non-deleted User Group. Behavior on PMAN Side : Mandatory Field : The  User_Group  field becomes mandatory if any of the following SDM roles are selected for a user: SDM Admin SDM Power User SDM Basic User Admin must provide an active, non-deleted User Group name in the  User_Group  column for these users. Optional Field : If no SDM roles are selected for a user, the  User_Group  field becomes optional: Leaving it empty will not generate errors. Adding a value will not save the User Group to the user record since Non-SDM users do not require User Groups. Behavior on SDM Side : Always Mandatory : On the SDM side, users are expected to have SDM roles by default. The  User_Group  field is always mandatory in the bulk upload template. Admins must provide an active, non-deleted User Group name in the  User_Group  column. Error Handling in Bulk Upload : If the  User_Group  field is empty or contains an invalid value (non-existent, deleted, or inactive User Group), the system should: Use the existing error messaging style in the generated error report. Bulk Download : When Admins download the user bulk file: The  User_Group  field should display the name of the User Group linked to each SDM user’s record. For Non-SDM users, the  User_Group  field should remain blank. Validation Rules : The system must validate the  User_Group  field during the bulk upload process to ensure: The User Group exists. The User Group is active and not deleted. The field is populated for SDM users when required. UI and Experience : Ensure consistency between PMAN and SDM templates for field naming and behavior. Display clear error messages in the error report for missing or invalid  User_Group  data. Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. Questions: Question # AC # Raised By Inquiry Date Assignee Response Date  Is the User Group supposed to be a mandatory field in the Bulk upload file and as well as on the Master Data > Users section?  Yes    /     12/26/2024      1/2/2025 # Question Recommendation Response Remarks

issues.summary: SDM: Link User Groups to SDM Supplier Records
issues.description: Business Case : As an  Admin , I want to link User Groups to SDM supplier records so that I can control access to these suppliers based on User Group associations. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  The  User Group  field will allow Admins to associate one or more User Groups with supplier records flagged as SDM-specific suppliers (i.e., suppliers with the  SDM Toggle  turned ON). Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU) with Supplier’s SDM Toggle = ON. What pages should this change impact?  SDM > Master Data > Suppliers > Supplier Record page. Which users should be impacted by the change? Vroozi Admin. SDM Admin. How should this feature work? User Group Field Visibility : The  User Group  field should appear only if the  SDM Toggle  is ON for a supplier record. The field should be located beside or under the  SDM Toggle  in the  Basic Info section . Multi-Select Functionality : The  User Group  field should allow multi-select functionality. Admins can select one or more User Groups from the list. Required Field Validation : If the  SDM Toggle  is ON, the  User Group  field should be a  required  field. Admins should not be able to save the supplier record until at least one User Group is selected. Editable on PMAN and SDM Sides : The  User Group  field should be editable on both the PMAN and SDM sides. Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. Questions: Question # AC # Raised By Inquiry Date Assignee Response Date Should there be a default user group or should it function in such a way that if there are no user groups selected, then the Supplier will be visible to all User groups?  TBD, we’ll figure this out.      12/26/2024      1/2/2025 # Question Recommendation Response Remarks

issues.summary: SDM: Link User Group to SDM User Profiles
issues.description: Business Case : As an  Admin , I want to  link  User Group to SDM user profiles so that I can control and configure the system access and functionalities for SDM users. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  This functionality allows Admins to associate a User Group with specific SDM users, ensuring proper configuration and access control. The  User Group  field will be mandatory for all SDM users and will enable streamlined management of user permissions. Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU). What pages should this change impact? SDM > Master Data > Users > User Record page. PMAN > Master Data > Users > User Record page. Which users should be impacted by the change? SDM Admin. SDM Power User. SDM Basic User. How should this feature work? User Group Field in User Profile : Add a  User Group  field to the user profile: PMAN Side : Display in the  Basic Info  >  Access section . SDM Side : Always visible by default for SDM users. This field will allow only one User Group to be selected at a time. Dropdown Behavior : The  User Group  field will function as a  searchable text input with dropdown results , similar to the  Content Group  field. Admins can start typing a User Group name, and the dropdown will display matching results in real-time. If no matches are found, the dropdown will show no results. Behavior Based on Role (PMAN Side) : The  User Group  field should be visible and mandatory when one of the following SDM roles is selected: SDM Admin SDM Power User SDM Basic User If none of these roles are selected, the  User Group  field should not appear in the profile. Behavior Based on Role (SDM Side) : The  User Group  field should always be visible and mandatory in the SDM module because these users are expected to have one of the SDM roles mentioned above. Mandatory Validation : The  User Group  field is a required field for all SDM users. Admins cannot save the user profile until a User Group is selected. If left empty, the system should not allow the Admin to save the user profile. Mock screenshot for reference : Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. Questions: Question # AC # Raised By Inquiry Date Assignee Response Date What happens to existing SDM users who do not have any User group assigned to their user profile? Need a data-fix assuming only 2 user groups will be created for NBCU in production and then accordingly assign those to users.      12/20/2024      1/2/2025 Would we need to create default User group, and then link that to all existing SDM users using a script? Yes      12/20/2024     1/2/2025 How would that default User group work in terms of access and settings?  and   to talk about this next week on which features to become configurable.      12/20/2024     1/2/2025 # Question Recommendation Response Remarks

issues.summary: SDM: Create and Manage User Groups in SDM Module
issues.description: Business Case : As an  Admin , I want to create and manage  User Groups  in the  SDM  module so that I can control system access and functionalities for SDM users in the future. Acceptance Criteria : What is the change?  The "User Groups" construct will serve as the foundational building block for future enhancements that link user records and supplier records. This functionality will allow Admins to configure and control the system access and functionalities available to different SDM users. Which customers should this change impact?  Customers using the SDM module (ex: NBCU). What pages should this change impact?  SDM > Master Data > Users page. Which users should be impacted by the change?  Vroozi Admin and SDM Admin. How should this feature work? User Groups Grid : The grid displays the following columns: Checkbox  (select for activation/deactivation). Group Name . Description . Created On  (date the group was created). Status  (Active/Inactive). Action  (delete option). The grid showcases up to 10 User Groups per pagination page, with additional groups displayed in subsequent pages. Create a New User Group : Admin should see a  "Create a New User Group"  button on the  User Groups  page. Clicking the button opens a dialog modal containing: Group Name : Text field (mandatory). Description : Text field (mandatory). Cancel  and  Save User Group  buttons. The  Save User Group  button should be  disabled by default . The button should only be  enabled  when both mandatory fields ( Group Name  and  Description ) are filled out. Clicking  Save User Group  creates a new User Group and displays a  green NOTY message : User Group added. View and Update Existing User Groups : Admin can click on an existing User Group's name in the grid. Clicking the name opens the  same dialog modal  populated with the group's current  Group Name  and  Description . The  Save User Group  button should only be enabled if both mandatory fields are filled out. Admin can edit one or both fields and click the  Save User Group  button to update the User Group. If no changes are made, clicking  Save User Group  should leave the User Group unchanged. Clicking  Save User Group  after changes displays a  green NOTY message : User Group updated. Validation Check : Group Name  needs to be  Unique . If not unique, at the time of saving the User Group, the system should throw an error message - Group Name should be unique. Search Functionality : Admins can search for User Groups using a search bar similar to the user search bar. Activate/Deactivate User Groups : Admins can select one or more User Groups using checkboxes and use  Activate  or  Deactivate  buttons to update their status. Delete User Groups : Admins can delete a User Group using the  Delete Action  in the grid. Pagination : The grid supports pagination, showing a maximum of 10 User Groups per page. Mock Screenshot for reference : Do we need a data fix for existing customers?  No. Would this change impact existing documents?  No. To which teams should this change be communicated to?  Purchase Team. Questions: Question # AC # Raised By Inquiry Date Assignee Response Date I think User Groups is quite generic and can be interpreted in many different ways and hence do you think we should rename it? If yes, I had few suggestions - Access Tiers Control Groups Access Groups Permission Groups Access Profiles Redbook (SDM) User Groups        12/22/2024       Do we need to link users from the create User Groups page itself similar to Production/Project page? Something we can explore but not necessary for the MVP. Lets keep this in mind for user experience.   12/23/2024   1/2/2025 # Question Recommendation Response Remarks

issues.summary: Vroozi API - Post Endpoint to re upsert the failed WBS
issues.description: Business Case: Develop a new POST endpoint to reprocess and upsert WBS elements that failed during the Bulk Upsert WBS API operation due to system errors. Acceptance Criteria: A new Post endpoint should be developed.  It should be asynchronous. This new POST endpoint should optionally accept the tracking id generated by WBS Bulk Upsert API. (For Bulk Upser WBS, please refer to  ) With the tracking id, this new Post endpoint should be able to find out which WBS elements are in: PENDING  state FAILED  state The new POST endpoint should re-upsert only the WBS elements with a status of  PENDING  or  FAILED  from the Bulk Upsert WBS API operation, based on the provided tracking ID. (For Bulk Upser WBS, please refer to  ) If no tracking id is specified, this new Post endpoint should find all the WBS object in  PENDING  or  FAILED  state irrespective of any specific bulk upsert call and re process them. The system failure should cover the following potential types: Time out Network failure. The server is down. The status of this new Post endpoint operation should be tracked by the Get Status API(please refer to  ) if the tracking id was given. Technical Details: Documentation:

issues.summary: Vroozi API: External Accounting Validation: The Line Item Subtotal can be specified as part of accounting definition reference in the External Accounting Validation Configuration service
issues.description: Business Case: The system should allow to specify the  Line Item Subtotal  as part of the accounting definition reference in the  External Accounting Validation Configuration  service. Acceptance Criteria: After introducing the aggregate toggle( ) in the  External Accounting Validation Configuration  service, it accepts the following inputs now: Accounting String Definition reference ( for deciding what data needs to be sent in payload and for error message generation ) External System Endpoint Documents and Events ( Events of the documents on which a call should be sent to the external system ) Line Item Subtotal  ( Consolidation of the identical accounting combination as a single entry and aggregation of the Line Item Subtotal if it is part of the accounting combination ) Currently, the system accepts all the accounting and organization info fields in the  Accounting String Definition reference  input of the  External Accounting Validation Configuration  service. The system should also accept the  Line Item Subtotal  field in the  Accounting String Definition reference  input of the  External Accounting Validation Configuration  service. If the  Line Item Subtotal  is specified: It should allow the system to send the  Line Item Subtotal  in the payload to the external system for validation. It should be a part of the accounting validation error message if an error is returned. If the  Line Item Subtotal  is not specified: It should not allow the system to send the  Line Item Subtotal  in the payload to the external system for validation. It should not be a part of the accounting validation error message if an error is returned. For line items with splits, the system should apply the defined  Min. Decimal Places  and  Max. Decimal Places  values to ensure accurate calculation of the subtotal for each split. Line Item Subtotal as part of accounting definition reference and its Aggregation: Now,  Line Item Subtotal  is part of the accounting definition reference in the  External Accounting Validation Configuration  service, and the  aggregate  toggle is also introduced( refer to   ), the following use cases should be handled accordingly. Line Item Subtotal in Accounting Definition Reference Aggregate Toggle  Expected Result Specified TRUE The  Line Item Subtotal  of line items having identical accounting strings should sum up.  Group the line items with identical accounting string values into a single entry in the payload sent to the external system for validation, including references to the individual items. Specified False Each line item with an accounting combination(accounting strings +  Line Item Subtotals ) value should have a separate entry in the payload sent to the external system for validation. Not Specified True Group the line items with identical accounting string values into a single entry in the payload sent to the external system for validation, including references to the individual items. Not specified False Each line item with an accounting strings value should have a separate entry in the payload sent to the external system for validation. Documentation: Technical Details: Need to add following field in the accounting configuration collection in accounting db. AMOUNT  in  ValidationField Need to create an int-webhooks-event-notification-queue queue which should be created for all the environments. Q&A:

issues.summary: Vroozi API: External Accounting Validation: Introduce Aggregation toggle in External Accounting Validation Configuration service
issues.description: Business Case: The system should aggregate identical accounting combinations of multiple line items into a single entry before sending them to the external system for validation. Acceptance Criteria: As implemented in  , the sub-feature toggle  externalWorkflow = true. Based on the selected value of the sub-feature toggle, the  External Accounting Validation Configuration Service  should be defined. Currently, it accepts the following inputs: ( refer to  ) Accounting String Definition reference ( for deciding what data needs to be sent in payload and for error message generation ) External System Endpoint Documents and Events ( Events of the documents on which a call should be sent to the external system ) Another input  aggregate ( Dev should decide the proper enum )   should be added to the  External Accounting Validation Configuration Service. This should be a boolean type input. The default value should be  FALSE. In case of  FALSE , the system should send the accounting string of each line item separately in the payload to the external system for validation. Setting it to  TRUE  should consolidate the identical accounting string values for multiple line items as a single entry in the payload to the external system for validation. ( with all line items referenced. Implemented in  )  and Team,  Please note that this new toggle  aggregate  in the  External Accounting Validation Configuration Service  should serve two purposes: Consolidation of the identical accounting string as a single entry aggregation of the amount if it is part of the accounting validating combination(accounting string + line item subtotal) In the future, there may be a use case where a customer requires consolidation of identical accounting strings without aggregating the amounts and we may require to introduce further settings under the  aggregate  toggle.  Therefore, please design it in a way that allows the future implementation of this use case with minimal effort if required. Documentation: A separate ticket should be created to introduce a static information section in the Vroozi API Docs. Tech ni cal Details: Q&A:

issues.summary: Vrozi API: External Accounting Validation: The user can see the accounting validation errors sent by the external system on the document
issues.description: Business Case: As a user, I want to see the accounting validation errors sent by the external system on the document. Acceptance Criteria: For functionality reference, please review the ticket    For Aggregate toggle, please review the ticket  If the accounting validation from the external system is timed out, the system should display a red Noty message. The Noty message should be a slider. After 5 seconds, the Noty message should slide away. The message should be  The accounting validation process is timed out. Please try again after a few moments. Accounting Validation Error Message When the Aggregate toggle is set to TRUE: If the accounting validation from the external system is completed successfully and returns errors, the system should display the accounting validation error message above the line item grid. ( The following requirements are subject to the findings of the spike   that what information the external system returns in case of errors. Therefore, only mockups are attached for the time being ) An error message from the external system should be expected for every error against the consolidated and aggregated accounting string or accounting combination( accounting string + amount ). That message should be displayed instead of the predefined messages for the internal accounting validation. There should be a fixed statement ' The following Accounting String is invalid because ' followed by the message sent by the external system. If only one accounting string is found invalid against one line item If only one accounting string is found invalid against multiple line item If multiple accounting string is found invalid against multiple line item If the external system does not send any error message in the error response, the error message on the UI should be  The following Accounting String is invalid. If a line item with no splits has an accounting validation error: If multiple splits of a line item have an accounting validation error: Accounting Validation Error Message When the Aggregate toggle is set to FALSE: The external system should send the validation response separately for each line item and its splits. For every line item containing the erroneous accounting string or accounting combination, an error message from the external system should be expected( accounting string + amount ). That message should be displayed instead of the predefined messages for the internal accounting validation. There should be a fixed statement ' The following Accounting String is invalid because ' followed by the message sent by the external system. Scrollable Accounting Validation Error Message Box: In case, the aggregate is set to  FALSE  and every line item response should be received individually, there is a possibility of having a large number of error responses.   The height of the current Accounting Validation Error message box can handle a limited number of errors, after which it starts expanding downwards. A scroll bar should be introduced in the Accounting Validation Error Message box to accommodate the large of accounting validation error messages. Documentation: Technical Details:    Q&A:   Integration Team  (                         )

issues.summary: Vroozi API: External Accounting Validation: The system should allow the external system, to validate accounting info on transactional documents non aggregate for amount fields approach
issues.description: Business Case: The system should ensure that the accounting information for transactional documents is validated through an external system. Acceptance Criteria: A new sub-feature flag should be introduced. ( The dev team should decide the enum for that ) This sub-feature flag should be dependent on the main Accounting Validation  ACCOUNTING_STRING_VALIDATION  flag. If the main Accounting Validation  ACCOUNTING_STRING_VALIDATION  flag is ON: The default value for this new flag should be  Internal. The other value for this flag should be  External. If the main Accounting Validation  ACCOUNTING_STRING_VALIDATION  flag is OFF: This new sub-feature flag should become irrelevant. This sub-feature flag should be switched between  Internal  and  External  based on the need. If the sub-feature flag is set to  Internal : The system should display the  Accounting Strings  menu in the admin’s left accordion menu. In the Accounting Validation Configuration Service, the system should ask for the following inputs: ( existing implementation ) Accounting and Organization objects which will: Determine what objects should be used to define the accounting strings. ( existing implementation ) Tell the system the objects that should be validated during the accounting validation process.    Documents and their events where the system should run the accounting validation. ( existing implementation )  If the sub-feature flag is set to  External : The system should not display the  Accounting Strings  menu in the admin’s left accordion menu as the validation rule and accounting validation should be managed and run by the external system. In the Accounting Validation Configuration Service, the system should ask for the following inputs: The external system’s endpoint Vroozi should hit to get the accounting info validated by the external system. Documents and their events where the system should send the call to the external system for accounting validation. At this point, only  PR Submission  is the event in the case of External Accounting Validation where the accounting validation should be executed. The  PR Submission  should be supported only in the PR document object of the Accounting Validation Configuration service when the sub-feature flag is set to  External . PR Submission: When the user hits the PR  Submit  button, the system should: An In Progress icon should appear on the  Submit  button. ( existing implementation ) Send the request to the external system ( as defined in the Accounting Validation Configuration Service ) The system should submit the document only when the accounting validation is completed successfully with no errors. If the accounting validation is completed successfully, and find errors, the system should keep the document in its current state.  The  Submit  button label should be updated from Submit to Validation Error(s). ( existing implementation ) Clicking on that should navigate the user to the Accounting Validation Error message visible above the line item grid. ( Please refer to the next section ) The system should keep the document in its current state if the accounting validation call is timed out for any reason. The system should have a red Noty message. ( Please refer to the next section ) The Noty message should be a slider. After 5 seconds, the Noty message should slide away. The message should be  Accounting Validation Error Message: The system should use the existing error message on the document. Documentation: Technical Details:    Q&A:   Integration Team  (                         )

issues.summary: Deltek Integration - Add a connector page for Costpoint Integration in Admin panel
issues.description: Business Case: As an admin, I can specify the Costpoint credentials on the  Company → Connectors  screen. So Vroozi can be connected to Costpoint ERP. Acceptance Criteria: There should be a new tile in the  Connectors  section of the  Company → Connectors  screen. The tile should contain the Costpoint icon. The default message in the Costpoint tile should be “ Sync your master data and transactional documents automatically with Costpoint “. If the connection is set up but disabled, the message should be “ Costpoiint connection is set up but currently disabled. “ If the connection is setup and enabled, the message should be “ Costpoiint connection is set up but and enabled. “ It should be collapsed by default. Admin should be able to expand/collapse it by clicking the icon in the right corner of the tile.( as appears for the other connectors ) Expanding the Costpoint Connector tile should display the following fields:( Need FE’s help to design the mockup.  ) URL (required) Username (required) Password (required) Connect button Enable connector The label should be “ Enable or disable this Vroozi Connector “ It should be disabled by default. Upon successful connection, the system should save these credentials in the DB. In addition, the system should save the unitID information in the DB. In case of invalid credentials, the system should show the error message from the Costpoint in the overlay. ( This image is for reference. Actual message from the Costpoint may vary ) All the information stored in the DB should be encrypted. Technical Requirements: We need to create a connector page for CostPoint application to allow client to provide Costpoint specific connection details for authentication and authorization via our admin UI. The connection details provided should be stored securely for our middleware to consume and connect to Costpoint API for subsequent integration. Documentation: Q&A:  Feature toggle:  INTEGRATION__COSTPOINT_CONNECTOR

issues.summary: Vroozi API: Update the Budget validation logic to the line item of the PR
issues.description:
Business Case: As an external system user, I want the API to ensure budget validation is performed based on the chosen accounting and organizational object values during PR creation or updates. Acceptance Criteria: Currently, the budget fetching query on the  PR API  modal is: find 
(     (costCenter = enteredValue OR costCenter is Empty)
  AND (GL = enteredValue OR GL is Empty)
  AND (companyCode = enteredValue OR companyCode is Empty)
  AND (purchasingOrganization = enteredValue OR purchasingOrganization is Empty)
  AND (plant = enteredValue OR plant is Empty)
) The above query only considers the objects that are ON for the unitID The above budget query should now handle all the Organization and Accounting objects: find 
(     (companyCode = enteredValue OR companyCode is Empty)
  AND (purchasingOrganization = enteredValue OR purchasingOrganization is Empty)
  AND (plant = enteredValue OR plant is Empty)
  AND (selectedCostObject = enteredValue OR selectedCostObject is Empty)
  AND (GL = enteredValue OR GL is Empty)
  AND (Customer = enteredValue OR Customer is Empty)
  AND (Class = enteredValue OR Class is Empty)
  AND (Project = enteredValue OR Project is Empty)
  AND (locationType = enteredValue OR locationType is Empty)
  AND (location = enteredValue OR location is Empty)
)
 This updated query should only consider the objects that are ON for the unitID This change should impact the following PR APIs: Create new purchase request. Update Purchase Request by ID. Update Purchase Request by request number. The system should validate the budget if the specified budget is present in the list of budgets fetched based on the update logic mentioned above. The system should throw the validation error if the specified budget is not in the list of budgets fetched based on the update logic mentioned above. Please note that we will update the budget query soon as it is intricate and very cumbersome to understand.
